title: Patient already registered
detail:
The patient already existed in the hospital system and no new record was created.

The detail field supports markdown rendering (Rendered by **marked.js**).
help: additional help or links related to the item

title: New registration created
detail: The patient had not previously attended the hospital and no record existed for them. A new record was created.
help: additional help or links related to the item

title: Could not register patient
detail: It was not possible to register the patient due to the circumstances at the time of their attendance
help: additional help or links related to the item
